001package gbw.melange.common.mesh.modifiers;
002
003/**
004 * <p>IBevelModifier interface.</p>
005 *
006 * @author GustavBW
007 * @version $Id: $Id
008 */
009public interface IBevelModifier extends MeshModifier {
010    /**
011     * @param num How many vertices to insert. More will mean a smoother rounded edge,
012     * less will mean more performant.
013     */
014    void setResolution(int num);
015    /**
016     * @param angleDeg What corners of the mesh should be beveled. E.g. an angle threshold of 30 deg,
017     * will make beveling only occur for corners sharper than 30 degrees.
018     */
019    void setAngleThreshold(double angleDeg);
020    /**
021     * @param absoluteRelativeDistance How "wide" should the bevel be in terms of relative screen space.
022     * "Absolute" is used here to indicate that, in the space of the mesh, the distance is absolute as bevel distance,
023     * at least in Blender, is usually based on actual side lengths (relative to mesh)
024     */
025    void setWidth(double absoluteRelativeDistance);
026
027}
